title: Dolomy Crossbody Bag Men Shoulder Bag for Men Business Man Purse Messenger Bag with Adjustable Strap
features: ★【Multifunctional Organizer】: The crossbody bag men has two storage spaces. The main bag is equipped with a soft compartment, which provides great protection against scratches and shocks for your tablet. Besides, the main bag comes with a built-in zipper pocket and two pen slots, which offers convenience to store your passport, credit card and pen. The back zipper pocket can store smartphone, charger and other accessories.

★【Great Durability】: The man bag is made of premium leather and polyester fabric, which makes the business men purse extremely durable. It has more excellent performance of water-resistant and wear-resistant than other crossbody bags.

★【Comfortable & Safe】: The width of the shoulder strap is 1.49 inch, which is wider than other shoulder straps. With multi-reinforced rivet buckle design, the adjustable shoulder strap provides you with a safe and comfortable carrying experience.
★【Innovative Design】: Fashionable and innovative design will perfectly meet your needs in daily, office, travel and business occasions. Besides, the mens messenger bag is suitable for gift giving.

★【Wide Compatibility】: The shoulder bag for men is compatible with iPad Pro 9.7/11 inch, iPad Air 9.7/10.9 inch, iPad 9.7 inch, iPad mini 7.9/8.3 inch, Galaxy Tab S6 10.5”, Tab S6 Lite 10.4”, Tab S5e 10.5", Tab A 8”, Tab A 10.1”, Tab A7 10.4”, Tab A7 Lite 8.7”, Surface Go 2 10.5”, Surface Go 10”, and more. ★★【NOT compatible with iPad Pro 12.9 inch】★★
